Our corrupt right honourable liars get a peerage.Â If I had my way, it would be a pierage Off the end of the pier. I would happily provide the concrete wet suit for free. With no raw materials other than fish, Singapore must be efficient to prosper.Â Their education and health system makes the British look like dinosaurs. I visited again five years ago (Shell Island), more of the same remorseless progress and true growth.Â But they have leaders, many of them scientists and engineers, not rubbish.Â Â I am now working in Lagos, Nigeria. The country is in trouble, but the kids here speak read and write better English than most of British youth, with not even a tenth of the money spent on the education experienced by British kids.Â Something is very wrong, and I do not think that the political class of today have either comprehension of the problems, or the capability to fix them.Â Given their lousy calibre, I doubt if they even care.
